title: ASR nodes implementation and documentation status
body:
# symbol

- [x] Program
- [x] Module
- [x] Function
- [x] GenericProcedure
- [x] CustomOperator
- [x] ExternalSymbol
- [x] DerivedType
- [x] Variable
- [x] ClassType
- [x] ClassProcedure
- [x] AssociateBlock
- [x] Block

# stmt

- [x] Allocate
- [x] Assign
- [x] Assignment
- [x] Associate
- [x] Cycle
- [x] ExplicitDeallocate
- [x] ImplicitDeallocate
- [x] DoConcurrentLoop
- [x] DoLoop
- [x] ErrorStop
- [x] Exit
- [x] ForAllSingle
- [x] GoTo
- [x] GoToTarget(int id)

- [x] Print
- [x] FileOpen

# Kinds

- [x] Integer kinds: 1 (i8), 2 (i16), 4 (i32), 8 (i64)
- [x] Real kinds: 4 (f32), 8 (f64)
- [x] Complex kinds: 4 (c32), 8 (c64)
- [x] Character kinds: 1 (utf8 string)
- [x] Logical kinds: 1, 2, 4: (boolean represented by 1, 2, 4 bytes)

# type

- [x] Integer
- [x] Real
- [x] Complex

- [x] List

cc @certik.
